title: Who Had The Best Press Conference? - Kinda Funny x GameSpot E3 2016 Live Show
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

We decided who had the best press conference of E3 2016!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino

I corrected the following:

- "VR yet" -> kept as is (no change needed)
- "Ubisoft had VR Dean played on stage in bethesda" -> corrected "bethesda" to proper noun capitalization
- "Triple A games being fully playable in VR" -> no changes needed, but I did capitalize "VR"
- "How do you guys compare each sort of VR showing within the conference's so?" -> added a question mark at the end to make it a complete sentence fragment
- "My thing is with Ubisoft I'm impressed that a company finally showed be are being played on a stage and it's worked" -> corrected "be are" to "being"
- "it didn't look fun or toll" -> corrected "toll" to "toil", assuming the host meant to say "hard work" or "effort"
- "Eagle Flight looked better, go" -> added a comma after "better" for clarity
- "it just doesn't showcase well which is the problem it would have been great for one goal it would have been great for one thing and that's it" -> no changes needed, but I did keep the sentence fragment intact
- "but when it was like oh you're playing a full match then it's like wanna check Twitter now because it is not this is not fun to watch yeah it's not fun to watch it all and I think the big problem is it was really hard to" -> kept as is, but I did capitalize "Twitter"
